data.name: speedseq
data.description: A flexible framework for rapid genome analysis and interpretation

evidence: "SpeedSeq: ultra-fast personal genome analysis and interpretation" and "A flexible framework for rapid genome analysis and interpretation" indicate a domain-specific genomics analysis tool used directly for research.
Quick start installation uses `git clone --recursive https://github.com/hall-lab/speedseq` followed by `make`, showing distribution primarily via the source repository.

Usage sections describe commands like `speedseq align`, `speedseq var`, `speedseq somatic`, and `speedseq sv` that take sequencing data and produce BAM/VCF outputs, directly performing genome analysis central to research results.
